name: web-search
description: Search the web using DuckDuckGo. Returns relevant search results with titles, URLs, and snippets. No API key required.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: web_search
toolDefinition.description: Search the web using DuckDuckGo and return relevant results with titles, URLs, and text snippets.

query.description: The search query string to look up on the web

maxResults.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 5, max: 20)
